name: Adventures of a pixel
description:
Be the pixel! 

You are nothing but a tiny pixel in a big world. Make your way through over 30 64x64 pixel-sized rooms and unlock new abilities (one at this point).

Credits

Most of the assets are made by me, but I used some (CC0) assets as a basis for some rooms. Here is a list of all external assets/music used:

SourceLicenseArtistBittersweet 27CC0DJ CrisPChallenge AcceptedCC0DJ CrisPCity Mega PackCC0GrafxKidRetro Lines - 16x16 PLatformer AssetsCC0VEXED
